answers.answer: Hi there,There can be several causes of baby not growing in first trimester. Hypertension in mother, diabetes or valvular heart disease, cigarette smoking, any drugs taken during pregnancy or any placental abnormality. After DNC it is usually advisable to wait for at least 3 months and give your body and mind a time of at least 3 months to recover. It is important to visit your gynecologist and discuss about it. You should be extra careful this time and be in regular touch of your doctor. Do keep me posted.Best luck and kind regards!
